projects.name: Diabetes Prediction Model Pipeline (MLOps Project)
projects.description: Developed a CI/CD pipeline for a machine learning model, cutting deployment time by 20%. Implemented automated workflow for a diabetes prediction model.

projects.name: Neural Network for Image Recognition
projects.description: Built a neural network from scratch for recognizing cat images, achieving 94% accuracy on a test set of 1,000 images.

projects.name: Full-Stack Personal Finance Management System
projects.description: Architected a comprehensive financial application using Java, JDBC, MySQL, and Swing. Crafted both backend database connectivity and frontend user interface, ensuring seamless integration.

projects.name: Brain-Controlled Game Interface
projects.description: Developed an ML model achieving 70% accuracy in predicting game controls from EEG signals. Mapped brain signals to four distinct commands using SVM and Random Forest.

projects.name: Genetic Algorithm On Traveling Salesman Problem
projects.description: Implemented a solution for the classic optimization problem using Python. Applied evolutionary algorithms to efficiently find near-optimal solutions for the NP-hard Traveling Salesman Problem.

experiences.description: Developed a machine learning model for person authentication using EEG data, achieving an accuracy of 74%. Extracted and preprocessed over 25 hours of EEG data from Physionet, improving model accuracy by 15% through data cleaning and feature engineering.
